abstract: The managers asserted that the view put forth by President Trump’s team that abuse of power is not an impeachable office was not only legally and constitutionally “wrong” but “dangerous.”
lead_paragraph: The seven House managers submitted one final written brief at noon on Monday, just an hour before the Senate was set to reconvene as a court of impeachment. The 34-page filing included a point-by-point rebuttal of arguments put forward by President Trump’s lawyers in his defense on Monday, and an appeal to senators to convict him based on the House charges.
